New Records: Rohit Sharma became the fastest Indian to reach 10,000 ODI runs
Shubman Gill scored the fastest 50 in his first ODI against Pakistan
India scored the highest total in the first 10 overs (79 runs) since 1999 against Pakistan
Key Match Events: Jasprit Bumrah took 2 wickets for 14 runs in the first two overs
Kuldeep Yadav took 3 wickets for 11 runs in 3 overs
Rohit Sharma and Shreyas Iyer's partnership of 117*
Pre-Game Insights: India chose to bowl, with Rohit Sharma indicating awareness of dew conditions
Pakistan's batting lineup included Babar Azam, Mohammad Rizwan, and Imam-ul-Haq
Post-Match Reflections: Rohit Sharma expressed pride in the team's performance
Kuldeep Yadav and Jasprit Bumrah were praised for their bowling performances
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played at the Narendra Modi Stadium with a sea of blue fans
The game was broadcast in the USA on ESPN+
The article highlighted the historical rivalry and significance of India vs Pakistan matches
